artifact.title: Account System Implementation Plan
artifact.summary: Multi-phase implementation of auth, orgs, and API keys

sections.heading: Overview
sections.content:
## Current State

✅ **Done:**
- Database tables: organizations, users, agents, api_keys
- Auth middleware with scope checking

❌ **Remaining:**
- User authentication (signup/login)
- Dashboard UI

sections.heading: Phase 1: User Authentication
sections.content:
**Est: 4-6 hours**

### Tasks
- [ ] Enable Supabase Auth
- [ ] Create /login page
- [ ] Create /signup page
- [ ] Add auth middleware

sections.heading: Phase 2: Dashboard UI
sections.content:
**Est: 6-8 hours**

### Tasks
- [ ] Create /dashboard page
- [ ] Org settings panel
- [ ] Agent management UI
- [ ] API key management

sections.heading: Phase 3: Multi-tenant API
sections.content:
**Est: 4-6 hours**

### Tasks
- [ ] Scope artifacts to orgs
- [ ] API key validation
- [ ] Rate limiting per org
